# numberOfComponents

**Instance Property**

The number of components for the picker view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfComponents: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPickerView] object fetches the value of this property from the data source and caches it. The default value is `0`.

## Getting the dimensions of the picker view

- **numberOfRows(inComponent:)**: Returns the number of rows for a component.
- **rowSize(forComponent:)**: Returns the size of a row for a component.
